Ref: CXP016/2022
Closing date: 29 December 2022

To provide transport administration support and service excellence to customers by meeting SLAs to ensure the safe, efficient and effective reconciliation of relevant documentation with specific regard to Transport.

Location: Wentworth Terminal, Durban

Main Duties include:

-Communicate, interpret and adhere to HSEQ policies and Zero Tolerance (ZeTo) rules to ensure safety, safeguard business operations and industrial compliance

-Good governance – ensure conformance to the established Limits of Authority (LOA) to safeguard the company’s interest, image and reputation.

-Adherence to policies and provisions of the Codes of Conduct & Business Ethics (COBE), Protection of Personal Information (POPI) and Anti-Bribery & Corruption (ABC)

-Office based – report to the respective shift Transport Operations Supervisor.

-Work primarily on SAP and FuelFacs based programs.  Generate documentation, post the receiving of Order Numbers from the Bulk Truck Operators (BTO’s).

-Update documentation on the FuelFacs program.

-Alerting BTO’s of the requirement to report to the Terminal from the Gate

Criteria:

-NQF Level 4 (Matric)

-Preferred / Advantageous – Mathematics / Accounting / Economics

-Experience in SAP / FuelFacs

-Depot or Transport operations experience

-Knowledge of Transport/ Distribution process
